body: You move on ice and snow as if it were dry ground.
name: Sure on Ice
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Frost Giants/New Rules/Frost Giant Feats/Sure on Ice

sections.body: You can move across icy and snowy surfaces without penalty, and don't need to attempt Acrobatics checks to run or charge on ice. You gain a +4 bonus on Climb checks to climb ice.
sections.name: Benefit
